sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../hoja-de-estilos/Card.css'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; /* import bootstrap trash icon: */ import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; function Card({ temp, max, min, name, img, onClose, handleOnDragEnd, humidity, lon, lat, date, description, wind, pressure, }) { console.log(description); return (

{name}

{`Today - ${date}`}

{description}

{`${temp}°C`}

{`Min: ${min}°C`}

{`Max: ${max}°C`}

{`Humidity: ${humidity}%`}

{`Wind: ${wind}`}

{`Pressure: ${pressure}`}
); } export default Card;
